top_stories.title: Prominent Ukrainian politician Andriy Parubiy shot dead in Lviv
top_stories.description: President Zelensky said the killing of Parubiy was an "terrible murder" and promised an investigation.

top_stories.title: Barrier being built around besieged Sudan city, satellite images show
top_stories.description: The earthen berm is intended to trap people inside el-Fasher, Yale University research shows.

top_stories.title: US blocks Palestinian leader from attending UN meeting in New York
top_stories.description: The decision comes as France leads international efforts to recognise a Palestinian state at the UN meeting next month.

top_stories.title: US court rules many of Trump's global tariffs are illegal
top_stories.description: The tariffs can remain in place until mid-October to allow the Trump administration time to request the Supreme Court take up the case.

top_stories.title: Mussolini's great-grandson makes Serie A debut
top_stories.description: Romano Floriani Mussolini, the great-grandson of Italian dictator Benito Mussolini, comes off the bench to help Cremonese defeat Sassuolo 3-2 in his Serie A debut on Friday.

quick_reads.title: Three dead after protests over death of taxi driver in Indonesia
quick_reads.description: The demonstrations - which also focus on cost-of-living and politicians expenses - are seen as a key test for President Prabowo Subianto.

quick_reads.title: Kim meets families of North Korea soldiers killed fighting for Russia against Ukraine
quick_reads.description: Kim Jong Un met the families of North Korean soldiers killed fighting for Russia against Ukraine.

quick_reads.title: White House defends Robert F Kennedy Jr amid CDC turmoil
quick_reads.description: The Centers for Disease Control had several top officials depart recently, leading to calls for the health secretary's resignation.

quick_reads.title: Sexist Italian image-sharing website forced to shut after political outcry
quick_reads.description: Leading Italian politicians spoke out against the site, which blamed the "toxic" behaviour of its users.

quick_reads.title: Why has Kamala Harris' security detail been withdrawn?
quick_reads.description: The overstretched Secret Service is required to provide 6 months of protection to former vice-presidents.

top_stories.title: Cracks are forming in Meta’s partnership with Scale AI
top_stories.description: Two months after making a $14.3B investment in Scale AI, Meta is relying heavily on its competitors to train next generation AI models.

top_stories.title: Spotlight on AI at TechCrunch Disrupt: Don’t miss these sessions backed by JetBrains and Greenfield
top_stories.description: TechCrunch Disrupt isn’t just about showcasing the startups of tomorrow — it’s also about surfacing the boldest ideas shaping technology today.

top_stories.title: TikTok now lets users send voice notes and images in DMs
top_stories.description: The new capabilities bring TikTok’s messaging experience more in line with that of other popular social apps and services.

top_stories.title: Uber and Lyft drivers in California win a path to unionization
top_stories.description: The agreement creates a model for drivers to be able to organize for increased pay, job protections, and other benefits. In exchange, California regulators say they’ll support legislation to reduce expensive insurance coverage mandates that ride-hailing companies have to pay.

top_stories.title: Tesla challenges $243 million verdict in Autopilot death trial
top_stories.description: The company's lawyers blame the driver (who settled with the victims separately) for the crash, and the plaintiffs' lawyers for "overwhelming" the jury with "irrelevant evidence."

quick_reads.title: WhatsApp fixes ‘zero-click’ bug used to hack Apple users with spyware
quick_reads.description: A spyware vendor was behind a recent campaign that abused a vulnerability in WhatsApp to deliver an exploit capable of hacking into iPhones and Macs.

quick_reads.title: Meta updates chatbot rules to avoid inappropriate topics with teen users
quick_reads.description: After a bombshell report on Meta allowing its AI chatbots to have sensual chats with minors, the company is updating its policies.

quick_reads.title: Mastodon says it doesn’t ‘have the means’ to comply with age verification laws
quick_reads.description: Decentralized social network Mastodon says it cannot comply with age verification laws, like in Mississippi and elsewhere, and says it's up to individual server owners to decide.

quick_reads.title: Henrik Fisker quietly wound down his nonprofit after his EV startup went bankrupt
quick_reads.description: The brief existence of the Fiskers' foundation is another example of how the boom of electric vehicle startups in the 2020s helped fuel a rush of wide-eyed optimism.

quick_reads.title: ChatGPT: Everything you need to know about the AI-powered chatbot
quick_reads.description: A timeline of ChatGPT product updates and releases, starting with the latest, which we’ve been updating throughout the year.

top_stories.title: From ‘cheap food and curry houses’ to upscale dining: The rise of Indian restaurants in the U.S.
top_stories.description: Upscale Indian dining in the U.S. has seen a recent boom with restaurants like Semma and Bungalow riding the wave of increased interest in global cuisine.

top_stories.title: Spirit Airlines files for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection for the second time in a year
top_stories.description: Spirit Airlines filed for bankruptcy protection again, just months after the budget carrier came out of Chapter 11 protection earlier this year.

top_stories.title: Retail panic: What the end of the 'de minimis' exemption means for brands across the globe
top_stories.description: The de minimis exemption, an obscure trade law provision, came to an end globally on Friday, setting off a panic across the retail industry.

top_stories.title: Trophy-property ranches hit the market as more heirs choose to sell
top_stories.description: Massive ranches are commanding eight-figure price tags after hitting the market for the first time in decades or generations.

top_stories.title: Inaugural Essence HBCU Classic football game to kick off Saturday in Boston
top_stories.description: The inaugural match-up is between with the Morehouse College Maroon Tigers and the Johnson C. Smith University Golden Bulls at Harvard Stadium on Saturday.

quick_reads.title: Americans expected to bet record $30 billion on the 2025 NFL season legally
quick_reads.description: The record legal gambling comes as prosecutors are starting to crack down on unlicensed sportsbooks.
